lead_paragraph: The photographer took 300 portraits of his wife between 1917 and 1937 — many of which are on view in an expansive new show of her work at the Tate Modern.

headline.main: A Collaboration Between Georgia O’Keeffe and Alfred Stieglitz, Captured Over 20 Years

snippet: The photographer took 300 portraits of his wife between 1917 and 1937 — many of which are on view in an expansive new show of her work at the Tate Modern....
